  • macOS 26 Tahoe Compatibility Fix: Resolved a bug introduced in the previous version that affected compatibility with macOS 26 Tahoe. ExtraDock now runs smoothly and reliably on macOS Tahoe once again!

We're always working to keep ExtraDock running perfectly on every version of macOS. More features and improvements are on the way â€“ keep sharing your feedback and ideas!

Thank you to the amazing ExtraDock community for your continued support. Your bug reports help us deliver the best dock experience possible!

And ExtraBar to create the ultimate menu bar that fits your workflow!
